response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I understand it might seem quite an investment, but I assure you it's worth every penny. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant discount compared to its market value. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, Alice", "product_price": 11000}
